item.title: [Blog] Programmers Don't Read Books -- But You Should
item.author: kevink2019@gmail.com (Kevin Kelly)
item.description: Programmers Don’t Read Books – But You Should Jeff Atwood discusses that while the market is flush with bad and boring programming books, finding - then reading - the good ones is still vital to our growth as engineers. Definitely check out his recommended reading list.
item.content:encoded:
Programmers Don’t Read Books – But You Should

Jeff Atwood discusses that while the market is flush with bad and boring programming books, finding - then reading - the good ones is still vital to our growth as engineers. Definitely check out his recommended reading list.
